title: Transformation
text: Is this a vertical or a horizontal transformation?
speech: Is this a vertical or a horizontal transformation?
pacedSpeech: Is this a vertical or a horizontal transformation?

title: Horizontal Transformation
text: Since this is a horizontal transformation, is it to the left or right?
speech: Since this is a horizontal transformation, is it to the left or right?
pacedSpeech: Since this is a horizontal transformation, is it to the left or right?

title: Left Transformation
text: Since it is $$3$$, it's a horizontal transformation to the left.
speech: Since it is  3 , it's a horizontal transformation to the left.
pacedSpeech: , it's a horizontal transformation to the left.
